content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST</link>  <description>HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-07-14T12:19:09Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;f367e900.1407"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;26d4e670.1404"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;f367e900.1407">   <title>CRA National Residential Seminar: please consider offering a workshop contribution. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;f367e900.1407</link>   <description> Dear One and All<br><br>When we circulated the initial information about the forthcoming CRA National Residential Seminar we indicated that the event would include the opportunity for 'engagement with innovative and interesting practice.' And this is your opportunity to help us realise that end!<br><br>The workshop sessions are consistently picked out by participants as key aspects of the event. A form which enables you to suggest contributions, in the form of workshops and stalls within the marketplace, is attached. If you'd like to showcase your work, learning points and all, in the event please complete this and let us have [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-14T13:19:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sam Green</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;f367e900.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;26d4e670.1404">   <title>"Open Badges", for us and our students? Webinar, 1- 2p.m., Friday 9th May 2014. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;26d4e670.1404</link>   <description> ***APOLOGIES FOR CROSS POSTING***<br><br>'Open Badges', for us - and our students? Webinar<br><br>Led by Chris Millson, University of York and Fiona Harvey, University of<br>Southampton<br><br>Friday 9th May 2014.<br><br>Digital/Open Badges are a new tool in the arena of recording<br>achievement. The fact that they are not simply a digital version of a<br>badge is what makes them interesting. Whether they will change how we<br>record achievement or facilitate learning remains to be seen, but there<br>is certainly much potential to explore. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-02T09:14:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sam Green</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEAR-EMPLOYER-INTEREST;26d4e670.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
